segments.text: Hi , I am looking for a woman named Mia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I am who you are looking for . You have got to be Rubin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Rubin ! Karen and Mike have spoken about you so often that I feel like I've met you before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope that what they had to say was mostly good !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They only said wonderful things about you . You did a good job of finding me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Finding the beautiful woman in a red dress next to the fountain wasn't all that hard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I guess it was a choice of me or the pigeons !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was hoping that we could take a walk down the street to my favorite cafe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lunch sounds great ! Let's head on out !
segments.speaker: S2
